page.title: 13REDCAR CRICKET CLUB
page.content: Redcar Cricket Club was formed in 1854 and in 1869 an All England 11 played a local team of 22 players.The England team won.The club plays in the North Yorkshire and South Durham League and they first won the league in 1894.The ground is compact and is overlooked by 2 terraces of large Victorian houses, Nelson Terrace and Trafalgar Terrace. The club at present consists of 6 teams:_ 1st team captain :_ D.Davis 2nd team captain :_ B.Lowe 3rd team captain :_ N.Berry Under 17s captain:_ M.Bowen Under 15s captain:_ N.Allinson Under 13s captain:_ M.Whitehead. Last year the under 13s won the Goldsborough Trophy and the Nixdorf Trophy.
